scripts.dev: npm run dev-compile-less && npm run dev-compile-js && npm run dev-js-concat
scripts.dev-novender: npm run dev-compile-less && npm run dev-compile-js
scripts.dev-itsm: npm run dev-compile-less-itsm && npm run dev-compile-js && npm run dev-js-concat-itsm
scripts.dev-itsm-simple: npm run dev-compile-less-itsm && npm run dev-compile-js && npm run dev-js-concat-itsm-simple
scripts.dev-futureITSM-simple: npm run dev-compile-js && npm run dev-js-concat-futureITSM-simple
